attributes.action: Make it easier for commonwealth soldiers to obtain uk citizenship
attributes.additional_details: Even after years of service you still have to apply ILR or face the risk of being kicked out a country they fought for even got life changing injuries for and also paid taxes for all these years. A refugee now have to go through less process to start here than a ex serving commonwealth soldier this is very shameful and something needs to be done thank you.
attributes.background: commonwealth soldiers that serve in the British army have to after 4 years have to do a life in the uk test and also with pay almost a 1000 pounds to gain their uk citizenship. Remember these are the same soldiers who done tours of Afghanistan, fought and defended this country with their blood.
